Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast!

Name: UCSD
Description: The University California, San Diego is one of the world's leading public research universities, located in beautiful La Jolla, California.

Name: UCB
Description: The University of California was founded in 1868, born out of a vision in the State Constitution of a university that would "contribute even more than California's gold to the glory and happiness of advancing generations."

Name: UCI
Description: UCI combines the strengths of a major research university with the bounty of an incomparable Southern California location.

Name: UCLA
Description: UCLA advances knowledge, addresses pressing societal needs and creates a university enriched by diverse perspectives where all individuals can flourish.

Name: PCC
Description: Pasadena City College is a community college in Pasadena, California enrolling over 30000 students each semester.
